description: This file is a JavaScript source code implementing a TodoMVC application using jQuery, Handlebars, and Router. It defines utility functions, an App object with methods for managing todos, event binding, rendering, and app initialization.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the application, loads todos, compiles templates, binds events, and sets up routing.

methods.name: bindEvents
methods.description: Binds DOM events to application methods for user interactions.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the todo list and updates UI elements based on current state.

methods.name: renderFooter
methods.description: Renders the footer with todo counts and filters.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Sets all todos as completed or active based on checkbox state.

methods.name: getActiveTodos
methods.description: Returns an array of todos that are not completed.

methods.name: getCompletedTodos
methods.description: Returns an array of todos that are completed.

methods.name: getFilteredTodos
methods.description: Returns todos filtered by current filter ('all', 'active', 'completed').

methods.name: indexFromEl
methods.description: Finds the index of a todo based on a DOM element inside its list item.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new todo item from input value.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of a specific todo.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a todo item.

methods.name: editKeyup
methods.description: Handles keyup events during editing, including Enter and Escape keys.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the title of a todo or deletes it if empty.
